product_desc:
Why The Health Not™ will offer to the world, one of the most technologically advanced wellness program on the market. We Create H.O.P.E.™!
WTHN’s H.O.P.E.™ is an “Health Oriented Pairing Engineer” algorithm. Typically, individuals don’t approach their lives with a "whole life" mindset. HOPE helps people identify the actions that will improve their total health, and guides them towards the resources (educational materials, professional recommendations, learning tools, and peer knowledge sharing) they need to optimize key aspects of their lives.  To that end, WTHN has carefully integrated nutrition tracking, digital health-monitoring devices (such as FitBit and Jawbone), gamification, and reward incentives to motivate people to make needed changes in how they manage their own health and wellness..
high_concept: Why The Health Not™ will provide you with H.O.P.E™
name: WHY THE HEALTH NOT
